headline: Wall Street Analysts Look Bullish on Axon (AXON): Should You Buy?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Axon (AXON). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: Why Axon Enterprise Is Worth Every Penny Of Its Sky-High Valuation
summary: Axon's explosive growth, premium valuation, and monopoly in law enforcement tech make it a high-conviction, long-term investment opportunity. See more on AXON here.
